body_html:
Ok, indeed it was refering to a wrong version of libtensorflow_framework.so. I have the Go framework installed with the C backend in 1.7.0, and when I have updated the python package through pip the link was done with the wrong version.

I did update the Go version and the C backend to 1.8.0 and now it works like a charm :)

Thanks a lot!!!
body_text:
Ok, indeed it was refering to a wrong version of libtensorflow_framework.so. I have the Go framework installed with the C backend in 1.7.0, and when I have updated the python package through pip the link was done with the wrong version.
I did update the Go version and the C backend to 1.8.0 and now it works like a charm :)

body:
Ok, indeed it was refering to a wrong version of `libtensorflow_framework.so`. I have the Go framework installed with the C backend in 1.7.0, and when I have updated the python package through pip the link was done with the wrong version.

I did update the Go version and the C backend to 1.8.0 and now it works like a charm :)

Thanks a lot!!!
